structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.text: No person shall have for sale, sell, give or deliver to another any product known, advertised, sold or offered for sale as kerosene, coal oil, fuel oil, stove oil, range oil, furnace oil, distillate or diesel fuel, or by a trade name commonly identified with any such product, unless the product constitutes a Class B liquid.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1954.
